description.default: This library holds all the various texts that are a part of the various monastic practices and rhythms of Urban Monasticism.
description.eng: This library holds all the various texts that are a part of the various monastic practices and rhythms of Urban Monasticism.
description.fra: Cette bibliothèque contient tous les différents textes qui font partie des diverses pratiques et rythmes monastiques du monachisme urbain.

Notes: The focus of this library is to include the various texts in there various languages/versions to make up our liturgies and practice guidance.
